price: Ka ce: "Abin sani, inã yi muku gargaɗi kawai da wahayi," kuma kurma ba ya jin kira a lõkacin da ake yi musu gargaɗi.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā undhirukum bil-waḥyi walā yasmaʿu al-ṣumu al-duʿāa idhā mā yundharūna
